search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Audienceful (audienceful.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Audienceful is: [https://audienceful.com/pricing](https://audienceful.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

![Image 33](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616cb8c47bc48d9a2471d869/6470b122b5326f5dbadff4d0_joeandjuice.webp)![Image 34](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616cb8c47bc48d9a2471d869/64ff85b32df37ce5f6d9aa2f_sohoblk.webp)![Image 35](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616cb8c47bc48d9a2471d869/64ff8017f9a11cd070d92170_moov.webp)![Image 36](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616cb8c47bc48d9a2471d869/649190064bc89d9efbc47c8b_spike.webp)![Image 37](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616cb8c47bc48d9a2471d869/6470b122c22911c855acce62_webflow%20copy%202.webp)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Do you offer free trials?

We don't offer free trials at the moment. However, if you sign up for a paid plan and decide against using Audienceful, we're happy to process a full refund within 14 days (assuming you aren't abusing or running afoul of our acceptable use policy).

Do you offer discounts?

We offer a discount on any plan when you choose yearly billing (equates to roughly 2 months free every year on most plans). We do not run any other sales or promotions outside of this.

Is Audienceful GDPR compliant?

We strive to comply with all privacy-related regulations including GDPR. Read more about our data privacy practices [here](https://www.audienceful.com/legal/gdpr).

Can you help me migrate from another platform?

Absolutely! Just reach out to [support@audienceful.com](mailto:support@audienceful.com) and we'll get you set up fast.

![Image 38](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/616cb8c47bc48d9a2471d869/65c42c96248c673051139da3_audienceful-logo-sm.png)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Yearly billing offers a discount equivalent to two months free.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Basic plan for up to 1000 contacts.
For growing teams with up to 3000 contacts.
Popular plan for unlimited collaborators and automations.
Advanced plan for larger teams and white-label emails.
Custom plan for 200K+ contacts and advanced needs.

additional_fees.fee_description: Monthly fee for a dedicated IP address.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Do you offer free trials?

We don't offer free trials at the moment. However, if you sign up for a paid plan and decide against using Audienceful, we're happy to process a full refund within 14 days (assuming you aren't abusing or running afoul of our acceptable use policy).

Do you offer discounts?

We offer a discount on any plan when you choose yearly billing (equates to roughly 2 months free every year on most plans). We do not run any other sales or promotions outside of this.

Is Audienceful GDPR compliant?

We strive to comply with all privacy-related regulations including GDPR. Read more about our data privacy practices [here](https://audienceful.com/legal/gdpr).

Can you help me migrate from another platform?

Absolutely! Just reach out to [support@audienceful.com](mailto:support@audienceful.com) and we'll get you set up fast.
